Name: ID
Description: unique row indentifier

Name: LIMIT_BAL
Description: amount of previously awarded credit

Name: SEX
Description: 1 = male; 2 = female

Name: RACE
Description: 1 = hispanic; 2 = black; 3 = white; 4 = asian

Name: EDUCATION
Description: 1 = graduate school; 2 = university; 3 = high school; 4 = others

Name: MARRIAGE
Description: 1 = married; 2 = single; 3 = others

Name: AGE
Description: age in years

Name: PAY_0
Description: repayment status in September, 2005. The measurement scale for the repayment status is: -1 = pay duly; 1 = payment delay for one month; 2 = payment delay for two months; ...; 8 = payment delay for eight months; 9 = payment delay for nine months and above

Description: repayment status in August, 2005. The measurement scale for the repayment status is: -1 = pay duly; 1 = payment delay for one month; 2 = payment delay for two months; ...; 8 = payment delay for eight months; 9 = payment delay for nine months and above
